# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that the burner entities have fuel before using them.
- Check the entity status to see if it is waiting for fuel.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that the entities have the required ingredients before using them.
- Check the entity status to see if it is waiting for ingredients.

### Errors when using entities that are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that the entities are connected to the electric network before using them.
- Check the entity status to see if it is not connected to the electric network.

### Errors when using entities that are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that the entities are plugged into the electric network before using them.
- Check the entity status to see if it is not plugged into the electric network.

### Errors when using pipe groups that are empty
- Ensure that the pipe groups are not empty before using them.
- Check the entity status to see if it is empty.

### Errors when using belt groups that are empty
- Ensure that the belt groups are not empty before using them.
- Check the entity status to see if it is empty.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the given execution logs.
